original_title: Helloween: Pumpkins United: Live At Wacken 2018
overview: On August 4th, Helloween took their "Pumpkins United World Tour" to the twenty-ninth edition of the world's largest heavy metal festival, Wacken Open Air, and performed one of the biggest and most important shows in the band's history.
title: Helloween: Pumpkins United: Live At Wacken 2018
